segment.source: How to use Group Policy to install ActiveX controls.
segment.target: How to use Group Policy to install ActiveX controls.

segment.source: ActiveX installation using group policy (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: ActiveX installation using group policy (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Group Policy and ActiveX installation
segment.target: Group Policy and ActiveX installation

segment.source: ActiveX controls are installed and invoked using the HTML object tag with the CODEBASE attribute.
segment.target: ActiveX controls are installed and invoked using the HTML object tag with the CODEBASE attribute.

segment.source: This attribute, through a URL, makes Internet Explorer:
segment.target: This attribute, through a URL, makes Internet Explorer:

segment.source: Get the ActiveX control if it's not already installed.
segment.target: Get the ActiveX control if it's not already installed.

segment.source: Download the installation package.
segment.target: Download the installation package.

segment.source: Perform trust verification on the object.
segment.target: Perform trust verification on the object.

segment.source: Prompt for installation permission, using the IE Information Bar.
segment.target: Prompt for installation permission, using the IE Information Bar.

segment.source: During installation, the rendering page registers and invokes the control, so that after installation, any standard user can invoke the control.
segment.target: During installation, the rendering page registers and invokes the control, so that after installation, any standard user can invoke the control.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: ActiveX control installation requires administrator-level permissions.
segment.target: ActiveX control installation requires administrator-level permissions.

segment.source: Group Policy for the ActiveX Installer Service
segment.target: Group Policy for the ActiveX Installer Service

segment.source: You use the ActiveX Installer Service (AXIS) and Group Policy to manage your ActiveX control deployment.
segment.target: You use the ActiveX Installer Service (AXIS) and Group Policy to manage your ActiveX control deployment.

segment.source: The AXIS-related settings can be changed using either the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC) or the Local Group Policy Editor, and include:
segment.target: The AXIS-related settings can be changed using either the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC) or the Local Group Policy Editor, and include:

segment.source: Approved Installation Sites for ActiveX Controls.
segment.target: Approved Installation Sites for ActiveX Controls.

segment.source: A list of approved installation sites used by AXIS to determine whether it can install a particular ActiveX control.
segment.target: A list of approved installation sites used by AXIS to determine whether it can install a particular ActiveX control.

segment.source: ActiveX installation policy for sites in trusted zones.
segment.target: ActiveX installation policy for sites in trusted zones.

segment.source: Identifies how AXIS should behave when a website tries to install an ActiveX control.
segment.target: Identifies how AXIS should behave when a website tries to install an ActiveX control.

segment.source: First, AXIS looks to see if the site appears in either the list of approved installation sites or in the Trusted sites zone.
segment.target: First, AXIS looks to see if the site appears in either the list of approved installation sites or in the Trusted sites zone.

segment.source: If the does, then AXIS checks to make sure the control meets your company's policy requirements.
segment.target: If the does, then AXIS checks to make sure the control meets your company's policy requirements.

segment.source: If the ActiveX control meets all of these requirements, the control is installed.
segment.target: If the ActiveX control meets all of these requirements, the control is installed.

segment.source: For more information about the ActiveX Installer Service, see Administering the ActiveX Installer Service in Windows 7.
segment.target: For more information about the ActiveX Installer Service, see Administering the ActiveX Installer Service in Windows 7.
